```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
assoc.hermit <- read_tsv("hermit.binary.plutype.assoc.txt")
```
```{r}
assoc.hermit %>% arrange(p_wald)
assoc.hermit$p_wald = -log10(assoc$p_wald)

```

```{r}
attach(assoc)
assoc.over6 <- assoc[which(p_wald>6),]
detach(assoc)
```

```{r}
assoc.over6 %>% arrange(p_wald)
assoc.over9 <- assoc.over6 %>% filter(p_wald > 9)
assoc.over8 <- assoc.over6 %>% filter(p_wald > 8)

```


```{r}
hermit.Fst100 <- read_tsv("hermit.mlf.vs.flf.sliding100.windowed.weir.fst")


hermit.Fst100.high <- hermit.Fst100 %>% filter(WEIGHTED_FST > .8)

hermit.Fst100.high %>% arrange(desc(WEIGHTED_FST))

hermit.Fst100.one <- hermit.Fst100.high %>% filter(WEIGHTED_FST == 1) %>% arrange(BIN_START)

```
